title: The Informer
description: Joel Kinnaman, Rosamund Pike, Common, Ana de Armas, Clive Owen. Former special operations soldier Pete Koslow's only goal is to break free from his criminal past and the years he wasted in jail. But his three FBI handlers have different plans for Pete, and they force him to go back to prison to help infiltrate the Polish mob in order to earn his freedom. Directed by Andrea Di Stefano. 2019/color/109 min/NR/widescreen.
